metadata.title: Fractal Cosmological Model: Unification via Antagonism and Fibonacci Structure
metadata.description: Cosmological tensions (H_0 ≈ 67-73 km/s/Mpc, CMB anomalies) motivate a fractal model unifying general relativity (GR), quantum mechanics (QM), and observational dynamics via a genesis operator (O) generating the Fibonacci sequence. A zero-dimensional initial state structures multiverses (U_n) through temporal singularities ({0}_{F_n}) converging to φ ≈ 1.618. The observer-metric coupling integrates the observer. Predictions (α ≈ 1.618 ± 0.1, CMB; γ(z) ≈ 1.382 + 0.36 log(1+z) ± 0.1, galaxies) reduce anomalies (χ^2 ↓ 81.63%, p = 0.002 at 3σ) compared to ΛCDM, testable with Planck/CMB-S4/Euclid. Analysis code is at Zenodo.
